title: City of Calumet: Emails re: Cited Journalist

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

1. Any communications to or from Commissioner Jerico Thomas, Deputy Commissioner Scott Nnameh, Mayor Thaddeus Jones, or Megan Wilson referencing the words "Sanders" or "Tribune" or which are otherwise related to Hank Sanders. This request is limited to records generated on or after September 1, 2023.

2. Any recordings of any telephone call to 911, dispatch, or the Calumet Police Department on or about October 20, 2023, concerning Hank Sanders or which were otherwise the genesis of Calumet City Police Dept. Incident Nos. 23-50415, 23-50449, or 23-50416.

3. Any records (including emails) concerning the blocking of the email address hsanders@chicagotribune.com, as referenced in Calumet City Police Dept. Incident No. 23-50416. 

4. The list of blocked email addresses to which hsanders@chicagotribune.com was added, as referenced in Calumet City Police Dept. Incident No. 23-50416.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Adam Steinbaugh
